text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While working out a training schedule<n>to make the most of
summer camp...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I have a favor to ask.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
These two hours after training on this<n>day—no, two to three
hours—could we<n>keep this time slot open?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: And, just to clarify, I mean for both of<n>us.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I have some... plans, yes. And I, um... I<n>just need you to be
there.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Would you be willing to help out?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's not like her to be so vague. She<n>looks a bit nervous,
though, so I<n>decide not to prod and give her the<n>okay.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Summer camp begins, and we train<n>according to schedule.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes... Thank you. And, um...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
You've remembered to keep two to<n>three hours open after
this... right?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Right, then please meet me at the<n>shrine in an hour and
thirty-five<n>minutes. I need to get ready, so I'll<n>meet you
there. Bye, for now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: An hour and thirty-five minutes later, I<n>head to the shrine.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Right on time. I can always count on<n>you to be punctual.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Not right now, no. Trainer, are you<n>fond of festivals?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The summer festival's very lively,<n>isn't it? And also... full of
delicious<n>aromas.
choice_data_list: So this is the big thing you were planning.
So this is the big thing you were planning.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It was my roommate who told me that<n>there'd be a
traditional summer<n>festival near the training camp.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I've been curious about Japanese<n>festivals ever since
coming here. And,<n>fortunately, we had some time after<n>
training today, so...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
...Well, it's not that I was trying to<n>hide it. It's just, I wasn't
sure when<n>to tell you, and kept putting it off.
choice_data_list: Gotta say, I'm kind of surprised.
Gotta say, I'm kind of surprised.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Surprised... that I'd be interested in<n>festivals? My roommate
also said as<n>much.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Or, to give a proper quote, "You don't<n>seem like the noisy
festival-goer<n>type."

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: However, in Germany we haveKarnevals, which involve muchmore noise than this festival. They'rewild fun, really.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
During the event, everyone is free to<n>laugh and get
intoxicated by the<n>festive mood—I don't mind it, actually.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
And so, since summer festivals are<n>such a wonderful part
of Japanese<n>culture, I put it in my schedule to<n>enjoy one
to the fullest. Come on<n>then, let's go.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Did you know we have candy apples<n>in Germany too?
Holiday markets<n>even have blue apples.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Ah... They're doing a festival dance<n>over there. What a
fascinating piece of<n>culture.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
They all look like they're having so<n>much fun—hm? Wait, are
they... waving<n>to us? Does that mean...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Huh? T-Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We get swept up in the festive mood<n>and are thoroughly
enjoying<n>ourselves, when...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Oh no, I lost track of the time!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The fireworks will begin three<n>minutes from now. If we
don't hurry...<n>No, the probability of making it on time<n>is too
low.
choice_data_list: You can't see them from here?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Well, you can, but according to what I<n>found, you can't see
all of them.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
So, I found a better spot about ten<n>minutes from here. If I ran
at a jog,<n>I'd probably get there in time, but...
choice_data_list: Then what are we waiting for?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: But you...
choice_data_list:
All that matters is that you get to enjoy the
fireworks!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I forgot my most important goal for<n>the day.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
We don't need to move. Change of<n>plans, we'll watch the
fireworks from<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes, I'm sure. See, the—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: (Just then, the shrill whistling of<n>fireworks cuts her off.)

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Wunderschön... It's so...beautiful.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I think this is the best spot after all.<n>Here, I get to accomplish
my initial<n>goal...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: "Having fun with you." That was my<n>top priority for the day.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: And I'm... having a lot of fun right<n>now. Are you?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Thank you. I'm happy too—properly<n>happy.
